name: Juventus VR - Ronaldo's Juve debut
detailed_description: It was a piping hot August day at the Bentegodi, but the temperature rose even higher when Ronaldo took to the field against Chievo to make his Serie A debut in front of a sell-out crowd. Chants for the Portuguese echoed around Verona, as he was the centre of attention in the match that ended 3-2 in favour of the Bianconeri. It was a game like no other. Experience unforeseen  video footage of his Juventus debut.
